title: Supreme Court takes up challenge to grace period for mail-in ballots
shortDescription: Republicans want to prevent states from counting mail-in ballots that are cast, but not received, before the end of Election Day.

title: Clinton defends Biden on health reports: 'I never saw him that way'
shortDescription: Bill Clinton said his 'only concern' about President Biden was whether he could have served a second term until he was 86 years old.

title: Senate prepares to tackle Trump's big tax bill – and make some changes
shortDescription: President Trump wants the Senate to slash taxes even more than the House-passed bill - and get the whole thing to his desk for signature by July 4.

title: Trump's tariffs 'not going away' amid legal fights: White House
shortDescription: President Trump would invoke other tariff authorities if his appeal of a trade court's ruling isn't successful, Commerce Secretary Lutnick said.

title: Trump and China's Xi Jinping to speak soon, iron out trade fight
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping will speak soon to iron out trade issues including a dispute over critical minerals.

title: Republican lawmaker doubles down, knocks Trump's tax bill
shortDescription: Sen. Ron Johnson of Wisconsin says he supports the president but wants to see the price of his sweeping tax bill come down before he supports it.

title: Donald Trump boosts false claim that Joe Biden was 'executed in 2020'
shortDescription: Biden was not executed, and he is still alive today. He served four years in the White House from 2021 to 2025 and had sought a second term before ending his campaign last summer.

title: Democrat hits GOP senator after she tells town hall 'we are all going to die'
shortDescription: Iowa Sen. Joni Ernst addressed federal cuts to Medicaid during a town hall that turned heated.

title: Stonewall vets sound alarm over Trump's attempt to erase trans history
shortDescription: Trans people fought police alongside gays and lesbians after a 1969 raid on the Stonewall Inn. A government website now tells just part of the story.

title: President Trump withdraws Elon Musk's ally nominated to lead NASA
shortDescription: President Trump has pulled his nomination of Jared Isaacman, a billionaire commercial astronaut with close ties to Elon Musk, as NASA administrator.

title: From gym memberships to gun silencers, see what's in Trump's tax bill
shortDescription: Trump's massive policy bill would extend income tax cuts, add restrictions to Medicaid and food stamps, pour funds into deportation efforts and more.

title: Meet the key Republican Senators and Representatives on Capitol Hill
shortDescription: Amid President Donald Trump's second presidential term, meet top Republicans in the House and Senate who are furthering his policies.

title: US court won't lift judge's block on Trump's government overhaul
shortDescription: The decision means that, for now, the Trump administration cannot proceed with plans to shed tens of thousands of federal jobs.

title: Trump unaware of Musk's alleged drug use
shortDescription: President Trump said he didn't know about Elon Musk's alleged drug use and backed the billionaire's cost-cutting.

title: President Trump's mass firings pause stays for now
shortDescription: A U.S. appeals court left a lower court order in place that blocked President Trump's sweeping government overhaul.

title: House bill could limit power of court orders against Trump policies
shortDescription: At stake is whether judges can enforce their orders blocking Trump policies that are ruled unlawful, as they already have 180 times.

title: Caitlin Clark's quads, Trump-Musk and more: Your week in review
shortDescription: Recapping some of the most talked-about news this week from the nation and around the world – in case you missed it.

title: Can young Democrats really threaten Pelosi's old guard?
shortDescription: Young Democrats launch primary challenges against senior incumbents in Congress, arguing that the party has an "inability to change" problem.

title: Trump responds to report of Musk reportedly using drugs during campaign
shortDescription: Trump was asked about a New York Times report that Musk used drugs such as ketamine, ecstasy and psychedelic mushrooms during the campaign.
